trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for columns that can bind to a property in the data source of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the binding that associates the column with a property in the data source.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding%2A> property allows a column to specify a property of the data grid's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> to bind to.
For more information about binding paths, see the "Binding Path Syntax" section in [Binding Declarations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-declarations-overview.md).
The object that represents the data binding for the column.
The default is `null`.
Gets or sets the binding object to use when getting or setting cell content for the clipboard.
An object that represents the binding.
Gets or sets the style that is used when rendering the element that the column displays for a cell in editing mode.
The style that is used when rendering an editing element.
The registered default is `null`.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.EditingElementStyle"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the style that is used when rendering the element that the column displays for a cell that is not in editing mode.
The style that is used when rendering a display-only element.
The registered default is `null`.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.ElementStyle"></xref> dependency property.
Notifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> when the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding"></xref> property changes.
The previous binding.
The binding that the column has been changed to.
Determines the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly"></xref> property based on property rules from the data grid that contains this column.
The value that was passed to the delegate.
`true` if cells in the column cannot be edited based on rules from the data grid; otherwise, `false`.
Rebuilds the contents of a cell in the column in response to a binding change.
The cell to update.
The name of the column property that has changed.
